text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Do you have the courage to stand up to @realDonaldTrump? Do you have any comments re: bounties placed by Russia on US servicemembers, commutation of Stone sentence, mismanagement of #COVID19, interference on behalf of M. Flynn, smearing of Dr. Fauci, lies about vote by mail?
